# SmartEscrowContract
Creating a benchmark contract for Escrow payments

## Statechart
[![](https://mermaid.ink/img/eyJjb2RlIjoic3RhdGVEaWFncmFtLXYyXG4gICAgWypdIC0tPiBVbmtub3duICAgIFxuICAgIFVua25vd24gLS0--IFJlZnVuZGVkOiBvd25lclxuICAgIENhbmNlbCAtLT4gQXJiaXRyYXRpb246IG93bmVyIiwibWVybWFpZCI6eyJ0aGVtZSI6ImRlZmF1bHQifSwidXBkYXRlRWRpdG9yIjpmYWxzZX0)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#/edit/eyJjb2RlIjoic3RhdGVEaWFncmFtLXYyXG4gICAgWypdIC0tPiBVbmtub3duICAgIFxuICAgIFVua25vd24gLS0--IFJlZnVuZGVkOiBvd25lclxuICAgIENhbmNlbCAtLT4gQXJiaXRyYXRpb246IG93bmVyIiwibWVybWFpZCI6eyJ0aGVtZSI6ImRlZmF1bHQifSwidXBkYXRlRWRpdG9yIjpmYWxzZX0)

stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Unknown    
    Unknown --> Created: owner
    Created --> Agreed: buyer
    Agreed --> Deposit: buyer
    Deposit --> GoodsSent: seller
    GoodsSent --> GoodsReceived: buyer
    GoodsReceived --> Completed: seller/owner
    Completed --> [*]
    Agreed --> Cancel: buyer/seller
    Cancel --> CancelAgreed: buyer/seller
    CancelAgreed --> Refunded: owner
    Cancel --> Arbitration: owner
